inscription: Lid verso: 信楽　自然釉　風; 庵窯　易久; red artist's seal: 易久 {Yasuhisa}
medium: Shigaraki ware, stoneware with natural ash glaze
text: Kōyama Yasuhisa began working in a ceramics factory in Shigaraki at age 15. After attending evening classes and studying with individual ceramic artists, he established his own kiln. He became a major force in reviving the single-chamber kiln (anagama), in which his atmospheric sculptures get their colors naturally from the ash of the wood firing.
title: Wind
